name: Out Of Control (Anirudh Is Online)
description:
You are scientist that has started working in a new lab and don't know your way around the lab.


An alarm goes off and when you check what's happening , everyone has evacuated the building.

Germs have spread all over the lab , you have a spray and use the LeftMouseButton to spray and maintain at least 2m distance between germs and yourself, if not you will lose control of yourself and things will get dark and be like that until the effects have worn-out.

Just a prototype , feedback appreciated
